title: Is iPhone 11 bigger than iPhone 11 pro? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, the iPhone 11 has a 6.1″ display and the iPhone 11 pro has a 5.8″ display. But the main difference is that the iPhone 11 has a liquid retina display, which is an lcd panel and the 11 pro has a Super retina XDR display, which is an Amoled panel.
